readme:
<$list filter="[[$:/language]get[text]removeprefix[$:/languages/]else[en-GB]]" variable="lang">
<$list filter="[<lang>search[zh]]">

在Tiddler的副标题下添加类似Notion的反向链接按钮。样例可见本tiddler的标题下方。

</$list>

<$list filter="[<lang>!search[zh]]">

Add notion-like backlink button under tiddler's subtitle. A sample can be found below the title of this tiddler.

</$list>
</$list>
